response:
The basic command is `/lp user <user> permission set <permission> true` or `/lp group <group> permission set <permission> true`.

Replace `<user>` with the user you want to give the permission to, `<group>` with the group you want to give the permission to, and `<permission>` with the permission node you want to give.

To give it to all players, you give it to the `default` group. E.g. `/lp group default permission set bending.command.rechoose true`
